moreMoney.title: Do you need more money?
moreMoney.detail: Of course, that should not be a problem. Visit our branch for a loan of up to CZK 1,500,000. Stop by and our bankers will be happy to help. Keep in mind that loans over CZK 1,000,000 require a cosigner.

moreMoneyVictory.title: We will call you
moreMoneyVictory.detail: Our phone banker will try to get in touch with you on the following business day. If he cannot reach you he will try again later.

scoringLessDisagree.title: That is the best we can offer you at this moment
scoringLessDisagree.detail: This is the amount which we are ready to loan you, should you reconsider and accept our offer.

branch.title: We are able to process business income in Internet Banka
branch.detail: Regarding other sources of income, please visit our branch or call us for more information.
branch.branch: Visit a branch/find the closest branch

branchBusiness.title: We can process business income in Internet Banka
branchBusiness.detail:
For other sources of income, please visit us at a branch or call us for more information.

Are you looking for a loan for business? Arrange a non-purpose loan for entrepreneurs, up to {loanAmount} without a tax return.

api.title: We are sorry, something went wrong

scoring.title: We are sorry, something went wrong
scoring.detail: Unfortunately, we can’t continue in the app; but we are happy to help you at one of our branches - please remember to bring your ID with you.

precontractDisagree.title: We can’t continue without your agreement
precontractDisagree.detail: Your loan is almost ready. In order to receive it, we need your agreement to the pre-contractual information and the contract Do you have any questions? Let’s talk about it.
precontractDisagree.branch: Visit a branch/find the closest branch

contractDisagree.title: We can’t continue without your agreement
contractDisagree.detail: Your loan is almost ready. In order to receive it, we need your agreement to the pre-contractual information and the contract Do you have any questions? Let’s talk about it.
contractDisagree.branch: Visit a branch/find the closest branch

SCORING_UNAVAILABLE.title: ZZZzzzz….
SCORING_UNAVAILABLE.detail:
At night we update some of our systems; therefore some systems might be unavailable.

Please come back in a couple of hours when we are up.

PRECONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.title: This will take all night…
PRECONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.detail: Every night we update our systems; therefore some systems might be unavailable. Unfortunately, we are currently unable to prepare your documents - we will have them ready for you by the morning at about 8 am. Thank you for understanding.

CONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.title: This will take all night…
CONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.detail: Every night we update our systems; therefore some systems might be unavailable. Unfortunately, we are currently unable to prepare your documents - we will have them ready for you by the morning at about 8 am. Thank you for understanding.

general.supportChat: Loan process just like in our branch - click here and our banker will be happy to assist you with the application via online chat.

billing.title: Where will we send the money and how to repay the loan?
billing.accountTitle: The money will be credited to your account:
billing.installmentDayTitle: The monthly installment in the amount of {0} CZK will be automatically deducted from your account.:
billing.detail:
Should the day of installment fall on a weekend or a bank holiday, the installment shall be deducted on the following business day.
The further the date of installment is from the date of loan arrangement, the more the amount of the last installment will differ from the rest of the installments. Please carefully read this information in the Pre-contractual information.

primaryOfferNib.title: Expres loan
primaryOfferNib.detail: With a bonus of up to CZK 5,000

secondaryOfferNib.title: Expres loan
secondaryOfferNib.detail: Borrow fully online with unprecedentedly low interest

promoOfferNib.title: Expres loan
promoOfferNib.detail: Need money fast and for anything? Take advantage of our advantageous Expres Loan with a low interest rate from {expres_loan_interest_rate} per year with an APR from {expres_loan_rpsn}. Now, with an extra bonus of CZK 5,000 for new loan agreements. You can arrange a loan in a few minutes fully online.
promoOfferNib.bulletsTitle: Other benefits that you will appreciate as a client
bullets: An extra bonus of up to CZK 5,000 for new loan agreements. Learn more on our website.
Repayment at rest even in the event of a loss of income with the selection of ability to repay insurance
Online from application to a signing of the contract. We invite you to the branch only when you can't do otherwise.
Low interest ratefrom {expres_loan_interest_rate} per year with APR from {expres_loan_rpsn}
Repay the loan early is no problem for us.

help.title: Do you need assistance or wish to save the application for later?
bullets: Online from application to contract signature - visit a branch only as the last resort
Money in your account within 5 minutes of signature.
No rush - you can save the application at any time or talk it over with our bankers.
Early repayment - is not a problem with us, with a maximum fee of  1 % of the early repaid amount.
help.detail: You can find all the information on Express Loan at on our website`.
help.finishLaterHeadline: Do you need to finish another time?
help.total: You will pay a total of

detail.subtitle: Fully online, zero fees, and funds in your account in five minutes. Repay with confidence thanks to payment protection insurance. Now with an extra bonus of up to CZK 5,000 for new loan agreements.
detail.title: Your loan:
detail.total: You will pay a total of
detail.totalTip: The interest and repayment are only indicative. Once we get to know each other better, we will calculate them for you.
detail.insurance: Payment Protection insurance for {0} a month on top of your loan repayment
detail.insuranceInfo: Find out more about PPI here.

insuranceHelp.title: Pay with confidence
insuranceHelp.subtitle: In the event that you lose your income due to an unforeseen situation, the insurance company will assist with:
bullets: Up to 12 repayments in the event of loss of employment (or loss of business) if you are unable to work or if you need to take care of a family member
Repayment of the loan in full in the event of becoming disabled (from 2nd degree) and receiving a ZTP/P pass (extremely disabled person with a need of a guide), or in case of death
Virtual doctor’s office 24/7 with a doctor on-call, who can write an electronic prescription or a referral for further care
insuranceHelp.insurance: Payment Protection insurance for {0} a month on top of your loan repayment
insuranceHelp.insuranceInfo: Assurance that you will pay your obligations.
insuranceHelp.detail: By clicking Continue, you confirm that you are not disabled and that you have read and understood the Terms and Condition of Insurance. If you are disabled, there will be no payment in the event of an insurance claim.

detail.insuranceBullet: Pay with confidence, even if you lose your income thanks to payment protection insurance.
bullets: An extra bonus of up to CZK 5,000 for new loan agreements. Learn more on our website.
Fully online - from application to agreement conclusion Only visit a branch if absolutely necessary.
Money in your account within 5 minutes of agreement conclusion.
There is no rush You can save your process for later and consult one of our bankers.

identification.title: Is this your name and surname?
identification.taxResidenceInfoBody: We kindly request information from you in order to fulfill the Common Standard for Due Diligence in the Field of Information on Financial Accounts for the purpose of exchanging information provided by financial institutions to tax administrations on the basis of the Multilateral Agreement of the Competent Authorities on the Automatic Exchange of Information on Financial Accounts (in case banks, these are current, savings accounts and time deposits).

entrepreneur.title: Jaký je rozdíl mezi Vašimi příjmy a výdaji?
entrepreneur.taxBase: Výše rozdílu (základ daně za minulý rok)
entrepreneur.taxBaseInfoMessage: Zadejte základ daně z minulého roku. Najdete ho v daňovém přiznání. V případě, že uplatňujete paušální daň, zastavte se za námi na pobočku kde s Vámi žádost dokončíme.
entrepreneur.line101LastTaxationPeriodIncomeInfoMessa: Zadejte částku z řádku 101 z daňového přiznání z minulého roku. V případě, že uplatňujete paušální daň, zastavte se za námi na pobočku kde s Vámi žádost dokončíme.
entrepreneur.unpaidTaxForLastYearInfoMessage: Zadejte skutečnou daň z příjmu z řádku 91 z daňového přiznání z minulého roku.
entrepreneur.taxInfoMessage: Po uplatnění slevy podle paragrafu 35c zákona ř. 71 - ř. 73

employerSearch.hint: Please enter at least the first 3 letters (with diacritics) of your employer

solvency.title: Is this your monthly income?
solvency.alternativeTitle: What is your net monthly income?
solvency.detail: If your income varies please enter the average of the last 3 months. Do you need a moment to calculate? Take your time - you can find your saved application in Balance Overview in Smart Banka.
solvency.description: Pokud si to chcete v klidu spočítat, dejte si načas – Vaši žádost najdete uloženou na Přehledu zůstatků Smart Banky.

pensionerPersonalSolvency.title: Is this your monthly pension?
pensionerPersonalSolvency.detail: If your pension varies please enter the average of the last 3 months. Do you need a moment to calculate? Take your time - you can find your saved application in Balance Overview in Smart Banka.

dependents.title: How many dependents?
dependents.detail: A dependent is any person who at least partly relies on your income for financial support. How many of those close to you would be affected by a decrease in your income?

pensionerDependents.title: How many dependents?
pensionerDependents.detail: A dependent is any person who at least partly relies on your income for financial support. How many of those close to you would be affected by a decrease in your pension?

householdSolvency.title: What is the net monthly income of your household?
householdSolvency.detail: Enter the net monthly income of your household - if the income varies please enter the average of the last 3 months. Do you need a moment to calculate? Take your time - you can find your saved application in Balance Overview in Smart Banka.
householdSolvency.description: Pokud si to chcete v klidu spočítat, dejte si načas – Vaši žádost najdete uloženou na Přehledu zůstatků Smart Banky.

pensionerHouseholdSolvency.title: What is the net monthly income of your household?
pensionerHouseholdSolvency.detail: Enter the net monthly income of your household - if the income varies please enter the average of the last 3 months. Do you need a moment to calculate? Take your time - you can find your saved application in Balance Overview in Smart Banka.

householdExpenses.title: What other personal expenses do you have?
householdExpenses.installmentsSum: Do you have any loans outside of Moneta Money Bank? Enter the total amount of monthly installments:
householdExpenses.housingExpensesInfo: Please enter all your monthly regular housing expenses. For instance rent, electric bills, water bills or other services. If you're sharing your housing expenses, please enter your share. Do not include mortgage payments, internet bills, food, clothing or household insurance.
householdExpenses.regularExpenses: Do you have any unusual regular expenses such as medication or medical aids? Enter the total monthly amount:
householdExpenses.salaryReduction: Do you have any attachments of earnings, for example due to distraint or alimony? Please enter the total monthly amount:

pensionerHouseholdExpenses.title: What other personal expenses do you have?
pensionerHouseholdExpenses.installmentsSum: Do you have any loans outside of Moneta Money Bank? Enter the total amount of monthly installments:
pensionerHouseholdExpenses.housingExpensesInfo: Include all regular monthly housing costs. For example, rent, utility payments, water and other services. If you share expenses, please only state a pro rata portion. These expenses do not include mortgage payments, internet payments, food, clothing or home insurance.
pensionerHouseholdExpenses.regularExpenses: Do you have any unusual regular expenses such as medication or medical aids? Enter the total monthly amount:
pensionerHouseholdExpenses.salaryReduction: Do you have any attachments of earnings, for example due to distraint or alimony? Please enter the total monthly amount:

householdExpensesNecessary.title: What are the other monthly expenses of your household?
householdExpensesNecessary.installmentsSumSection: Do you pay off the lease or loan elsewhere than at MONETA Money Bank?
householdExpensesNecessary.necessaryExpensesSection: What are the necessary expenses of you and your dependents?
householdExpensesNecessary.necessaryExpensesInfo: These are regular living expenses that you can't live without. If you share them, only include their pro rata.

necessaryExpensesError.title: Your necessary monthly expenses are higher than your income
necessaryExpensesError.detail: You may have included rent or a mortgage payment. We are mainly interested in the necessary monthly expenses

richBullets.title: Food, clothing, internet payments, insurance, housing costs (such as rent, utility bills, water and other services)
Education for children (nurseries, kindergartens, schools, lunches, clubs, groups)
Please do not include loan repayments including mortgages

housingExpenses.title: What is your household expenses?
housingExpenses.detail: Please enter all your monthly regular housing expenses. For instance rent, electric bills, water bills or other services. If you're sharing your housing expenses, please enter your share. Do not include mortgage payments, internet bills, food, clothing or household insurance.

scoringInfo.title: Now the small details:
scoringInfo.detail: Please select a form of ID which you could present at one of our branches.

otherInfoExtended.title: Now the small details:
otherInfoExtended.detail: Please select a form of ID which you could present at one of our branches.

agreement.title: One last step - the agreement
agreement.checkboxText: I hereby confirm that the entered details are correct
agreement.detail:
In order to review your application, we need to process your personal data to inquire your solvency, credibility and payment behavior. This process includes verification in the Czech Banking Credit Bureau and the Czech Non-Banking Credit Bureau, and other steps necessary to contract conclusion.

I acknowledge personal data processing of the MONETA Group and I solemnly declare the following:

  • that all personal data provided are true and up-to-date and that I am aware that providing false or misleading information may result in legal action or prosecution;
  • I have not been convicted of crimes related to my business, or of economic crime, or crime against property;
  • I also declare that:
    • I have not been declared bankrupt, and no insolvency or any such legal action has been taken against my person, nor have any steps been taken to initiate them;
    • the petition for bankruptcy of my assets or the insolvency petition for lack of my assets have not been rejected;
    • none of my assets are being liquidated
    • there are no arrears related to my assets in the Tax Register;
    • there has been no disciplinary punishment against my person in the last three years in accordance with the special regulations governing the performance of professional activities;
    • there are no outstanding arrears on insurance premiums and penalties for public health insurance or on insurance premiums and penalties for social security and contributions to the state employment policy.

I give consent to Moneta Money Bank to verify all necessary information and take any further steps which Moneta Money Bank will deem necessary to the approval of my application.

I acknowledge that according to the Consumer Credit Act, the information that I have been provided is considered a recommendation not advice.

You can be updated on the process of reviewing your application by SMS at the entered phone number.

scoringAgreement.title: One last step - the agreement
scoringAgreement.checkboxText: I hereby confirm that the entered details are correct
scoringAgreement.detail:
In order to review your application, we need to process your personal data to inquire your solvency, credibility and payment behavior. This process includes verification in the Czech Banking Credit Bureau and the Czech Non-Banking Credit Bureau, and other steps necessary to contract conclusion.

I acknowledge personal data processing of the MONETA Group and I solemnly declare the following:

  • that all personal data provided are true and up-to-date and that I am aware that providing false or misleading information may result in legal action or prosecution;
  • I have not been convicted of crimes related to my business, or of economic crime, or crime against property;
  • I also declare that:
    • I have not been declared bankrupt, and no insolvency or any such legal action has been taken against my person, nor have any steps been taken to initiate them;
    • the petition for bankruptcy of my assets or the insolvency petition for lack of my assets have not been rejected;
    • none of my assets are being liquidated
    • there are no arrears related to my assets in the Tax Register;
    • there has been no disciplinary punishment against my person in the last three years in accordance with the special regulations governing the performance of professional activities;
    • there are no outstanding arrears on insurance premiums and penalties for public health insurance or on insurance premiums and penalties for social security and contributions to the state employment policy.

I give consent to Moneta Money Bank to verify all necessary information and take any further steps which Moneta Money Bank will deem necessary to the approval of my application.

I acknowledge that according to the Consumer Credit Act, the information that I have been provided is considered a recommendation not advice.

You can be updated on the process of reviewing your application by SMS at the entered phone number.

anotherUpload.detail: We are sorry that we could not tell you sooner, but we are going to need another document. A clear and legible photograph should suffice. You can do it within the app or visit our branch.
anotherUpload.secondaryButton: I want to visit a branch

poorUpload.title: Some documents could not be processed
poorUpload.secondaryButton: I want to visit a branch

branchNeeded.title: We have to meet
branchNeeded.detail:
We are sorry that there is no other way, but we would like to see you at our branch.
We can finish the application together and we will send you the money as soon as it is signed. Please bring with you :
branchNeeded.primaryButton: I understand; show me the nearest branch

uploadCheck.title: We’re going to check legibility and get back to you
uploadCheck.detail: Your documents should be checked within 15 minutes or by the following business day. As soon as we are ready to continue, we will let you know via SMS. The application has been saved and can be found under Balance Overview.

photoCapture.title: Vyfoťte přední stranu občanského průkazu
photoCapture.detail: Platný doklad, za dobrého osvětlení, ostře a nerozmazaně.

photoCapture.title: Vyfoťte zadní stranu občanského průkazu
photoCapture.detail: Platný doklad, za dobrého osvětlení, ostře a nerozmazaně.

review.title: Skvělá fotka! Přečetli jsme vše správně?

personalData.title: Vámi poskytnuté údaje ověříme zároveň v základních registrech. Více o jejich fungování na webu Správy základních registrů a Monety Stisknutím tlačítka Pokračovat potvrzujete, že všechny uvedené informace jsou pravdivé, úplné, správné a aktuální.

busyLoader.title: Chvilku strpení, kocour to musí všechno zkontrolovat

uploadDocumentResultUploadAgain.title: Jejda, tohle se nepovedlo
uploadDocumentResultUploadAgain.detail: Vyfoťte prosím dokument znovu, za dobrého osvětlení, ostře a nerozmazaně.

photoCapture.title: Vyfoťte přední stranu řidičského průkazu
photoCapture.detail: Platný doklad, za dobrého osvětlení, ostře a nerozmazaně.

13.title: Podepsané Potvrzení o výši příjmu
13.detail: Stáhněte si Potvrzení o výši příjmu a nechte si ho u zaměstnavatele vyplnit a podepsat. Půjčku jsme Vám teď uložili. Do 30 dnů se můžete kdykoli vrátit, podepsané potvrzení tady vyfotit a pokračovat.

112.title: Výplatní doklad od České pošty (složenka), který není starší než 30 dnů

documentUpload.chooseDocTitle: Vyfoťte prosím jeden z následujících dokladů
documentUpload.chooseDocDetail: Půjčku jsme Vám uložili. Do 30 dnů se můžete kdykoli vrátit, doklad vyfotit a pokračovat

uploadedDocuments.title: Please take a picture of both sides of your ID. The process is secure.

Attach the back page of your ID

uploadedDocuments.title: Download this form and have your employer fill it out and sign it. The application has been saved. You can come back any time in 30 days, upload the signed form, and continue.
labels: Attach a signed proof of income

uploadedDocuments.title: Please take a picture of the following:

documents.title: Payment receipt from the Czech Post that is not older than 30 days

uploadPicker.title: Choose a way to upload a document

documentUploadRetry.title: Oops, this is not going to work
documentUploadRetry.detail: We were not able to read all the data. Please make sure that the lighting is good and texts are clear and well-readable.

manualCheck.title: We have to review your application and that may take a moment.
manualCheck.detail: You will find the result here within 2 days. Thank you for understanding.

scoringNok.title: After reviewing your application we can not offer you a loan.
scoringNok.detail: If you have any questions, we are here to help.

docScoringSame.title: Everything is OK. Let’s continue

By clicking Continue, you confirm that you are not disabled and that you have read and understood the Terms and Condition of Insurance

If you are disabled, there will be no payment in the event of an insurance claim.

We are sorry but there is no other way. We are looking forward to seeing you at our branch.

Please bring with you:

branchDocumentTypes.title: Filled out Proof of income from your employer
Payment receipt from the Czech Post (postal order) not older than 30 days.

docScoringBranch.total: You will pay a total of
docScoringBranch.insurance: Repayability insurance for {0} per month to repay
docScoringBranch.primaryButton: I understand, show me the nearest branch

insurance.title: Pay with confidence
insurance.subtitle: In the event that you lose your income due to an unforeseen situation, the insurance company will assist with:
bullets: Up to 12 repayments in the event of loss of employment (or loss of business) if you are unable to work or if you need to take care of a family member
Repayment of the loan in full in the event of becoming disabled (from 2nd degree) and receiving a ZTP/P pass (extremely disabled person with a need of a guide), or in case of death
insurance.bulletsFooter: Virtual doctor’s office 24/7, with a doctor on-call, who can write an electronic prescription or a referral for further care
insurance.detail: By clicking "Insure" you agree to a General insurance contract including Insurance Terms and Conditions, and hereby arrange an insurance in case of incapacity for work, third-degree disability, death, or loss of employment or hospitalization. The insurance is not necessary to arrange the loan.
insurance.iddDetail: The legal documentation for your insurance will be delivered to you electronically. The original paper documents can be acquired at any MONETA Money Bank branch.
insurance.footer:
By clicking Continue, you confirm that you are not disabled and that you have read and understood the Terms and Condition of Insurance

If you are disabled, there will be no payment in the event of an insurance claim.

insuranceDisabled.title: One more detail - have you been granted a disability pension?
insuranceDisabled.detail: To set up your payment protection insurance correctly, we need to know whether you have been granted a disability pension.
insuranceDisabled.yes: Yes, I have been granted disability pension (1st, 2nd, or 3rd degree)
insuranceDisabled.footer: Unfortunately, we’re not able to offer you insurance. But you can still get the loan — your monthly repayment will be {0} without insurance.

waitingBeforeNeedsAnalysis.title: Just a moment while we prepare the document
waitingBeforeNeedsAnalysis.detail: It should only take a moment

needsAnalysis.title: Read the documents regarding your insurance
needsAnalysis.subtitle: All documents can be found under Documents in Smart Banka and Internet Banka.
needsAnalysis.agree: By clicking "Continue" I confirm that I have read and understood the documents.

disagreement.title: We need your agreement to continue
disagreement.detail: Your loan is almost ready. In order to receive it, we need your agreement to the pre-contractual information and the contract Do you have any questions? Let’s talk about it.

signByUs.title: Just a moment, we are signing the contract

waitingBeforeContract.title: Just a moment, we are preparing the contract

victory.title: It’s done. The money is on its way into your account and should be there within 5 minutes. Enjoy!
victory.detail: All of your documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in My Documents.

tomorrowVictory.title: Your loan will be ready next business day in the morning.
tomorrowVictory.detail: All of your documents can be found in My Documents section of Internet Banka and Smart Banka.

delayedVictory.title: We are almost done. The signing may take a while.
delayedVictory.detail: We couldn't sign the document automatically and will have to sign it manually. That may take a while - a couple of hours during business days, and on Monday during weekends. We will save the contract in your My Documents section. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

sign.title: Sign the contract with your PIN number, eventually with biometrics

vacationTravel.navigationTitle: All set! The money will be credited within five minutes. Are you planning a trip?
vacationTravel.title: Arrange travel insurance
info: Premiums start at CZK 42 per day
Your insurance will cover medical expenses up to CZK 15 million.

electronics.navigationTitle: All set! The money will be credited within five minutes.
electronics.title: Carry your phone and other valuables worry-free
info: If you lose personal belongings, the cost of replacing them will be covered.
The insurance also covers card loss or unauthorized online payments.
It also covers damage to smartphone or tablet with Smart Banka.

creditCard.title: We understand you don’t need more money at this moment. But since you’re already approved, why not have a credit card on hand just in case you ever need it?
creditCard.detail: All documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka under ‘My Documents’.

toUDC.title: First, we merge your existing loans and then we can add a new one to them
toUDC.detail: We will merge the new loan with this loan:
toUDC.elsewhere: I have loans elsewhere that I want to consolidate as well
toUDC.primaryButton: Consolidate and apply for another loan
